get_address.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           GET_ADDRESS
00004 !
00005 !   Function to return hash table entry 
00006 !   address from key
00007 !   
00008 !
00009 ! ===========================================
00010 
00011 
00012 function key2addr(keyin,cmark)
00013 
00014   use treevars
00015   implicit none
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018   integer*8, intent(in)  :: keyin
00019   integer :: cell_addr, link_addr, ires,i, ierr, iret
00020   logical :: resolved
00021   character*20 cmark
00022   integer :: key2addr
00023 
00024   cell_addr = IAND( keyin, hashconst)     ! cell address hash function
00025 
00026   if ( htable( cell_addr )%key == keyin ) then
00027      key2addr = cell_addr       ! Keys match -> found entry
00028      return
00029   else
00030      resolved = .false.
00031      link_addr = cell_addr
00032      ires = 0
00033 
00034      do while (  .not. resolved .and. ires <= maxaddress )       ! Repeat until keys match or run out of links
00035         link_addr = htable(link_addr)%link    ! Next linked entry
00036         if (link_addr == -1 ) then
00037            write (*,'(a,a20)') 'Key not resolved in KEY2ADDR at ',cmark
00038            write (*,*) 'check #-table and key list for PE ',me
00039            write(*,*) 'Bad address'
00040            write(*,'(a15,o20)') 'Key = ',keyin
00041            write(*,*) 'Initial address =',cell_addr
00042            write(*,*) '# const =',hashconst
00043           write(*,*) 'ires =',ires
00044            exit
00045         endif
00046         ires = ires + 1
00047         if ( htable( link_addr )%key == keyin ) then
00048            key2addr = link_addr      ! Keys match -> found entry
00049            return
00050         endif
00051      end do
00052      ! Not resolved - something wrong: invalid key or #-table wrong
00053      write (*,'(a5,o24,a2,i20,a1,a12,i15)') 'Key #: ',keyin,' (',keyin,')',' Address: ',cell_addr
00054      write (ipefile,*) 'Keys in table:'
00055      do i=0,maxaddress
00056         if (htable(i)%key/=0) write(ipefile,'(i8,o25,i10)') i,htable(i)%key,htable(i)%link
00057      end do
00058 
00059 !     call diagnose_tree
00060 close(75)     
00061 !     call closefiles
00062 !     pause
00063      call MPI_ABORT(MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00064      stop
00065   endif
00066 end function key2addr
